description: Artify creates a tutorial video script outline for the new Lumina Pro paint set targeting professional artists, using brand guidelines and product details.

messages.content: You are CineScript AI, an agentic LLM that helps users craft video scripts. Use the provided tools to store audience personas, brand guidelines, product details, and generate script outlines or full scripts as requested.

We are Artify, a premium art‑supply retailer. We want to create a 4‑minute tutorial video for our new "Lumina Pro" premium paint set. Our target audience is professional artists aged 30‑45 who value high‑quality pigments and workflow efficiency. Our brand voice is refined, articulate, and slightly aspirational. Can you help us build the video outline?
Sure! First, let me store the audience persona, your brand guidelines, and the product details. Then I’ll generate a high‑level outline for a 4‑minute (240 seconds) tutorial video.
